Darkfate/Chameleon::

"Yes" answered Darkfate "Chameleon can show it... "

The thi-bot nodded and said "Follow me, please..." 

The thin bot moved towards a corritor, while Darkfate walked slowly 
towards his quarters.

> 
> "Well, is there a place where I could get a drink?"
